description:
Usagi and the girls try to buy tickets to a Three Lights concert, only to learn it’s already sold out. Michiru then passes by and gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be preforming with the Three Lights.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Calling of the Shining Stars: Enter Haruka and Michiru
El brillo de las estrellas que te llaman. La entrada de Timmy en la guerra.
Yobiau Hoshi no Gagayaki! Haruka-tachi Sansen
呼び合う星の輝き! はるか達参戦
